name: sfchronicle
text: The #GlassFire has burned 51,266 acres and was 2% contained as of Wednesday evening. The fire has destroyed 36 single-family residences in Sonoma County, destroyed 107 single-family residences in Napa County, and is threatening another 26,290 structures. https://t.co/d8ARTW047z
